1.name: Large Field
1.description: You are standing in a large grassy field with an ominous scarecrow in the center.

2.name: Scary House
2.description: Looming in front of you is a big spooky house that might be filled with ghosts.

3.name: Cult Clearing
3.description: You come to an unexpected clearing in the dense forrest. A satanic circle is drawn around a bonfire in a dark red liquid.
